alert.note: Alert for Southern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 27 at 2:13PM PDT until October 28 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM PDT SATURDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM SATURDAY TO 11 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. For the Wind Advisory, north winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Lake County. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 1 AM to 10 AM PDT Saturday. For the Wind Advisory, from 5 PM Saturday to 11 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.
